original_title: Edumix recognised at at National ICT Awards
original_body_lines: Edumix, a Learning Management System (LMS) for Sri Lankan institutes, won a Bronze Award in the education in inclusions and community services category at the recently held National ICT Awards – NBQSA 2022. Edumix provides educational institutes a safe, cost effective and convenient option to continue its business in an online/hybrid environment. Edumix, which is a product of Databox Technologies (Pvt.) Ltd, is currently being used by over 70 educational institutes (with over 80,000 students). These institutions include General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University, Sisulka Higher Educational Institute, Ratnapura, Syzygy Nugegoda / Gampaha, Infinity Business School, Amila Dassanayake Institute and Anuradha Perera Institute. NBQSA is the only National ICT competition in Sri Lanka to showcase and recognize the innovations of individuals and organizations for their outstanding contribution to the development of ICT Industry in Sri Lanka.
